name: Alex Brucce
description: I am a simple and honest man with a great sense of humor ..I am romantic at heart,I love to laugh and have a positive outlook on life..I am so lonesome here and I am ready to accommodate happiness and love back into my life..I want to settle down happily with the woman of my dream,someone I will share my life,my love and my everything with forever more..someone with good vision,intention and approach about life…someone who is comfortable with herself and believes that life is too short to be lonely.I am a good listener,compassionate and looking for a long term relationship..
